div.div: HARD TO SAY GOODBYE TO YESTERDAY

div.a: A Eulogy For My Dead BlackBerry 10 Demo, Which Lived For Four Days

div.div: Back on January 30, when you were given to me for free at the launch of BlackBerry 10 by your eager PR team, I could never have guessed that just four days later, on February 3, I'd be saying good-bye.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WI8hGs&via=Digg&text=A Eulogy For My Dead BlackBerry 10 Demo, Which Lived For Four Days

div.a: Google Wants Self-Driving Car Tech Available Within Five Years

div.div: Could our days behind the wheel really be numbered?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WINWRz&via=Digg&text=Google Wants Self-Driving Car Tech Available Within Five Years

div.a: A Dark And Sincere Interview With Kai The Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker

div.div: A sad and touching — and, yes, of course, somewhat bizarre — conversation with the internet’s latest phenom.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVmAZO&via=Digg&text=A Dark And Sincere Interview With Kai The Hatchet-Wielding Hitchhiker

div.a: Snow Panic Has Driven Weather.com Completely Insane

div.div: You know how sometimes the best way to deal with a ranting, screaming maniac is just to leave him alone until he exhausts himself? It's time for us to do that with Weather.com.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XWkGGf&via=Digg&text=Snow Panic Has Driven Weather.com Completely Insane

div.div: PELOSI DOESN'T WANT YOU TO KNOW

div.a: What Stephen Colbert Told Democrats At His 'Secret' Retreat Talk

div.div: On Friday morning Stephen Colbert addressed a group of House Democrats on retreat in northern Virginia. Anticipating the meeting's content, host Nancy Pelosi closed it off from press.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XfkiVf&via=Digg&text=What Stephen Colbert Told Democrats At His 'Secret' Retreat Talk

div.div: Oil-rich, velvet-rope-poor Azerbaijan, a country about the size of South Carolina on the Caspian Sea, would very much like to be the world’s next party capital.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4sWVp&via=Digg&text=The New Dubai?

div.a: When Did We Start Hating Pubic Hair?

div.div: Grooming accidents are exploding. When did we start hating pubes?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YHeMK1&via=Digg&text=When Did We Start Hating Pubic Hair?

div.div: THE CLOSING OF THE AMERICAN MIND
School is broken and everyone knows it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/122zgNu&via=Digg&text=How To Save College

div.a: Triumph Crashes The World's Most Expensive Dog Wedding

div.div: It's a lavish affair, and Rabbi Triumph is there to share the joy and the butt-sniffing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WUo8jx&via=Digg&text=Triumph Crashes The World's Most Expensive Dog Wedding

div.a: The Cost Of War Includes At Least 253,330 Brain Injuries And 1,700 Amputations

div.div: In 11 years of war, nearly 130,000 U.S. troops have been diagnosed with PTSD, and vastly more have experienced brain injuries. Over 1,700 have undergone life-changing limb amputations. Over 50,000 have been wounded in action. As of Wednesday, 6,656 U.S. troops and Defense Department civilians have died.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11VgT1F&via=Digg&text=The Cost Of War Includes At Least 253,330 Brain Injuries And 1,700 Amputations

div.a: Alleged Cop-Killer And His Arsenal 'Could Be Anywhere At This Point'

div.div: More than 24 hours after Dorner allegedly shot and killed one police officer and injured two others, police say they have no idea where the former cop with a vendetta against police has gone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XtfSq7&via=Digg&text=Alleged Cop-Killer And His Arsenal 'Could Be Anywhere At This Point'

div.a: Inside The Actual Graveyard Where Ben & Jerry's Bury Their Discontinued Flavors

div.div: Surrounded by a white picket fence on a grassy knoll, lie the headstones of especially beloved flavours or particularly despised flavours, some that were introduced as early as the late 1970s when the ice cream company was founded, but sadly met their untimely fate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YI3sxo&via=Digg&text=Inside The Actual Graveyard Where Ben & Jerry's Bury Their Discontinued Flavors

div.a: Kid Weatherman Delivers Forecast Like An Old-Timey Broadcaster

div.div: North Dakota station KVLY hosts a Scheels Weather Kid as a guest meteorologist each Thursday, but they might as well shut the program down and give the gig to William Hallman.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11Vbho5&via=Digg&text=Kid Weatherman Delivers Forecast Like An Old-Timey Broadcaster

div.a: Next Time Your Mom Says Don't Go Out in The Rain, Spray Yourself With This

div.div: This product, called "Ultra Ever Dry" is a nano-tech coating you can spray on any number of different surfaces, shoes, cinder blocks, coats. But words don't do it justice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YH5DkI&via=Digg&text=Next Time Your Mom Says Don't Go Out in The Rain, Spray Yourself With This

div.a: The Awkward Art Of Writing About Sex

div.div: Being caught with your aesthetic pants down can be a writer's worst fear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XV6P2Q&via=Digg&text=The Awkward Art Of Writing About Sex

div.a: The Mystery Of The Kidnapped Wonder Horse

div.div: Exactly 30 years ago, kidnappers broke into the Ballymany Stud in the Republic of Ireland and stole the champion racehorse, Shergar. What happened to the animal remains a mystery.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wyah66&via=Digg&text=The Mystery Of The Kidnapped Wonder Horse

div.a: Pirate Bay Documentary Ready For Download

div.div: At long last TPB:AFK, the Kickstarter-funded documentary about the persecution of The Pirate Bay is finished and online, and ready for you to download.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4wren&via=Digg&text=Pirate Bay Documentary Ready For Download

div.a: Beware The Next Nefarious Up-Charge: Whiskey, Neat

div.div: In all my years of bourbon drinking, this was something new: I was being charged extra for drinking my Woodford straight. Or perhaps I was being penalized for not imbibing it on the rocks?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UJeFR0&via=Digg&text=Beware The Next Nefarious Up-Charge: Whiskey, Neat

div.a: In Defense Of Waiters Who Don't Smile

div.div: After several days of training about customer service at McDonald’s, a Soviet teenager asked the trainer: “Why do we have to be so nice to the customers? After all, WE have the hamburgers, and they don’t!”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X4gp5s&via=Digg&text=In Defense Of Waiters Who Don't Smile

div.a: Is Your Town On The FAA's New Drone List?

div.div: A total of 81 public entities have applied for FAA drone authorizations so far. Is your town on the list?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YJdZID&via=Digg&text=Is Your Town On The FAA's New Drone List?

div.a: How Can A President's Email Get Hacked?

div.div: Seriously, how the heck do you hack an ex-president's email these days?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WySwU8&via=Digg&text=How Can A President's Email Get Hacked?

div.a: Why Does The Weather Channel Insist On Naming Storms?

div.div: Despite the objections of the National Weather Service, the Weather Channel has taken to naming storms. But why start now?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/123VS0e&via=Digg&text=Why Does The Weather Channel Insist On Naming Storms?

div.a: Fox News Claims Solar Won't Work In America Because It's Not Sunny Like Germany

div.div: Thanks to Fox News and its expert commentators, millions of Americans now understand the real, hidden reason why Germany's solar-energy industry is so much further along than ours.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xbbi3l&via=Digg&text=Fox News Claims Solar Won't Work In America Because It's Not Sunny Like Germany

div.a: Asteroid To Buzz Earth Next Week

div.div: An asteroid the size of an office building will zoom close by Earth next week, but it's not on a collision course, NASA says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/125M1qt&via=Digg&text=Asteroid To Buzz Earth Next Week

div.a: Powerful Photographs Of Refugees’ Shoes In South Sudan

div.div: This series of powerful images documents the shoes belonging to some of the 30,000 refugees who travelled by foot across the border from Sudan’s Blue Nile state over to neighbouring South Sudan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xb7UFG&via=Digg&text=Powerful Photographs Of Refugees’ Shoes In South Sudan

div.a: The Cost Of Living Around The World

div.div: Tokyo has reclaimed its place as the world's most expensive city. See how other cities stacked up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UEENwm&via=Digg&text=The Cost Of Living Around The World

div.div: The oceanic squid can fly more than 100 feet through the air at speeds faster than Usain Bolt if it wants to escape predators, researchers have discovered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V38HI8&via=Digg&text=Squid Can Fly

div.div: R. KELLY ONLY BELIEVES HE CAN
Being the hottest thing in pop music means believing you can do absolutely anything you want.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdmaL9&via=Digg&text=Frank Ocean Can Fly

div.div: Few things have been more loved and neglected than Flickr. It was the web’s first smash-hit photo-sharing site and a proto-social network that launched the same month as Facebook. Then Yahoo bought it and nearly destroyed it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XsrCsO&via=Digg&text=Flickr Is Back

div.a: Rinkside Reporter Takes A Puck To The Face

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XUqIHr&via=Digg&text=Rinkside Reporter Takes A Puck To The Face

div.a: 'Unflattering' Beyoncé Photos Have Been Removed From Getty's Website

div.div: Getting images removed from photo agencies' websites: so hot right now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12xgIcZ&via=Digg&text='Unflattering' Beyoncé Photos Have Been Removed From Getty's Website

div.a: Hack Reveals George W. Bush's Interesting Paintings

div.div: The apparent hack of several e-mail accounts has exposed personal photos and sensitive correspondence from members of the Bush family, including both former U.S. presidents.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WGE6zp&via=Digg&text=Hack Reveals George W. Bush's Interesting Paintings

div.a: The Unsettling Beauty Of Lethal Viruses

div.div: Few non-scientists would be able to distinguish the E. coli virus from HIV under a microscope. Both viruses are as different in their design as they are in their outwardly effects.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YekkcP&via=Digg&text=The Unsettling Beauty Of Lethal Viruses
